example.name: re-ligate-v
example.text: Bacteria-1 which had taken up a plasmid that did not contain foreign DNA but had simply been re-ligated *trace*-1 to itself could be identified by being resistant to both antibiotics.

example.name: re-ligation-n
example.text: The recombination reaction is then halted by cleavage of the junction and re-ligation of the released DNA .
